overview: Everyday the children of the neighborhood known as "Tire Dié", in the city of Santa Fe, wait for the train to ask for money, shouting "Tire dié!" (toss me a dime!) to the passengers. Considered the first survey-on-film in Latin America.

production_companies.name: Instituto de Cinematografía de la Universidad Nacional del Litoral

title: Toss Me a Dime
